name: .22 full auto receiver
description: A scavenged full auto receiver, use it to craft a full auto .22 firearm.

name: .223 full auto receiver
description: A scavenged full auto receiver, use it to craft a full auto .223 firearm.

name: .308 full auto receiver
description: A scavenged full auto receiver, use it to craft a full auto .308 firearm.

name: 9mm full auto receiver
description: A scavenged full auto receiver, use it to craft a full auto 9mm firearm.

name: .45 full auto receiver
description: A scavenged full auto receiver, use it to craft a full auto .45 firearm.

name: 12 gauge full auto receiver
description: A scavenged full auto receiver, use it to craft a full auto 12 gauge firearm.

name: 7.62x39 full auto receiver
description: A scavenged full auto receiver, use it to craft a full auto 7.62x39 firearm.

name: survival kit in a can
description: A large tin can held together by a tab and seal. Remove the seal to split the container into two smaller cans and reveal its contents. It contains carefully packed survival items with a list of them on the side of the can. You could not possibly put its contents back together.

name: survivor's tazer blade
description: A makeshift blade with a knuckle guard that doubles as a tazer. Has a wrap on the handle to prevent self shock.

name: survivor's tazer dual blades
description: Two makeshift blades with knuckle guards that double as a tazer. Has a wrap on the handle to prevent self shock.

name: solar flashlight (off)
description: This is a heavy duty LED solar flashlight.  Using this flashlight will turn it on and provide light, assuming it is charged with batteries. Reload more batteries or put in the sun to charge.

name: solar flashlight (on)
description: This is a heavy duty LED solar flashlight.  This flashlight is turned on, and continually draining its batteries.  Use it to turn it off.

name: can forge (off)
description: This is a portable light source/forge/food cooker made from a soda can with pebbles reinforcing the inner wall, powered by charcoal. It is used to melt down metals, cook some food and providing low light for crafting.

use_action.need_charges_msg: The forge ran out of charcoal.

name: can forge (on)
description: The forge is on. It is ready to use as indicated by the light. Feed it more charcoal to keep it on.

use_action.need_fire_msg: You need a lighter or matches to light this.

name: metal mold
description: This is a makeshift mold made from plastic.  It could be shaped and used to craft items made of metal.

name: molded hammer
description: This is a molded metal hammer with a metal handle.  It functions like a professional hammer but it is bulkier and weighs more, adding a little bashing power

name: molded knife
description: This is a sharpened molded metal blade with a metal handle.  Works better than sharpening any old metal.

name: molded pot
description: A metal molded pot. Works as intended.

name: molded shovel
description: This is a molded metal shovel with a metal handle. Works as a normal shovel but is bulkier.

name: molded axe
description: This is a molded metal axe with a metal handle. Works as a regular wood axe but is bulkier.

name: solar electric firestarter
description: This is a crudely made electric firestarter modded to recharge in the sun, which can function as an inefficient lighter.

name: wearable solar flashlight (off)
description: This is a heavy duty LED solar flashlight with straps for wear.  Using this flashlight will turn it on and provide light, assuming it is charged with batteries. Reload more batteries or put in the sun to charge.

name: wearable solar flashlight (on)
description: This is a heavy duty LED solar flashlight with straps to wear.  This flashlight is turned on, and continually draining its batteries.  Use it to turn it off.

name: fishing string
description: A long string with a hook attached to the end. Useful as a crude fishing tool. Requires bait as lure and sinker.

name: solar torch
description: A mysterious torch that uses the power of the sun (and blob goo) to light itself. Somehow, the gasoline synthesized goo produces gasoline when in the sun continuously soaking the rag making it 'rechargeable' in a sense. You need a lighter to turn it on. Once lit, it can't be turned off until all fuel is used.

use_action.need_fire_msg: You need a source of fire to light this.

name: solar torch (lit)
description: A mysterious torch that uses the power of the sun (and blob goo) to ligt itself. Somehow, the gasoline synthesized goo produces gasoline when in the sun continuously soaking the rag making it 'rechargeable' in a sense. It is burning, producing plenty of light, now to wait for it to run out of fuel.

name: gasoline synthesizing blob glob
description: A piece of glob that has begun to create gasoline when exposed to the sun. The gasoline it creates is too mixed up with the glob to be extracted but is still flammable.

name: molded saw
description: A Molded saw that somewhat combines the utilities of wood and metal saws.

name: Directions to My Bugout Location
description: This is the location of the Bugout location my friend and I ordered to be made, I should really memorize this...

use_action.message: After putting it off for a while, you memorize the location...

name: full auto receiver case
description: A case for a full auto receiver, with a full auto mechanism and a specific caliber casing, you can make a full auto receiver.

name: collapsed fighting bow
description: A collapsed fighting bow for easy storage. Disassemble to arm the bow.

name: Encampment Project Reminder
description: A note describing a group of people creating prepper settlements. You try to remember if there are any of them nearby. Maybe the back of the note has coordinates to their settlements.

use_action.message: You read the back of the note and plan your next move.

comment: The hammer multi-tool is a disassembler
name: hammer multi-tool
description: A multi-tool whose top is a hammer and a pair of pliers combined. Small and practical, the survivor's mini-tool-kit.

name: Survivor's Cookbook
description: A notebook filed with ideas for lots of makeshift gadgets and gizmos. Once the ideas of mad-man with too much free time are now invaluable knowledge.

name: scout's tool
description: This is an electronic, solar/rechargeable battery powered, bulky wrist mounted tool designed to provide an accurate topographical map of your surroundings when used. It also comes with digital clock and alarm features.

name: bioinjector
description: An odd, organic-looking auto-injector that slowly secretes some sort of red, blood-like substance. From what you can understand from the label, it's an experimental stimulant that stabilizes minor wounds and increases performance at a cost of inflicting pain.

name: organic infusion set
description: A strange infusion set with several organic-looking parts.  It has multiple tubes for simultaneous extraction and infusion of blood.  Its label refers to something called XE037 as the main active component.

name: organic defusion set
description: A strange infusion set with several organic-looking parts.  It has multiple tubes for simultaneous extraction and infusion of blood.  Its label refers to it as a rapid stem cell treatment by replicating your own stem cells for better results..

name: Map to Unknown Lab
description: This is a map made by a former scientist of the Bio-Weapon project. It marks the location of an abandoned laboratory, where a great enemy resides.

use_action.message: You read the map. You gulp and realize what must be done...

name: mysterious note
description: "We have to move away from this place, now.  That thing is coming, and if we don't get out in time, we're all dead.  Grab what you can and head to this location - we'll be establishing a temporary hideout there."

use_action.message: Looking down at the note, you memorize the location shown.

name: hand-drawn map
description: "Finally.  I've figured out the coordinates of that lab the terminal records referred to.  From what I can tell, there must be some things of value left inside, and I don't think there's anyone left to care if I take a look."

use_action.message: The directions on the map catch your interest. You wonder if going there is a good idea...

name: stealth cloak (folded)
description: An experimental cloak that uses a highly sophisticated network of cameras and LEDs to render the user fully invisible. It is powered by built-in torsion ratchets. It is currently folded.

name: mil-surp weapons pack
description: A box sold in military surplus store targeted to the civilian market. Offers a military surplus rifle, shoulder strap, ammo, basic maintenance kit with batteries, and pocket guide book. This contains the Mosin Nagant 1891/30 rifle.

name: mil-surp weapons pack
description: A box sold in military surplus store targeted to the civilian market. Offers a military surplus rifle, shoulder strap, ammo, basic maintenance kit with batteries, and pocket guide book. This contains the SKS rifle.

name: mil-surp weapons pack
description: A box sold in military surplus store targeted to the civilian market. Offers a military surplus rifle, shoulder strap, ammo, basic maintenance kit with batteries, and pocket guide book. This contains the M1903 Springfield rifle

name: paracord survival watch
description: A simple wristwatch on a plastic band wrapped with a paracord bracelet and a thermometer attached.  Tells the time and has an alarm clock feature.

name: paracord bracelet
description: A simple bracelet made out of paracord. Disassemble for some string

name: Biological Weapon Conversion Kit
description: A suspicious box containing many parts, tools and... flesh?  A manual is inside the box detailing the instructions on how to use the contenxt of the box.  It says to use the introductary information packet for more information... whatever that is...
